rows.label: tev900491_MSG0010
rows.name:
Ah, it is you... How fateful, that we
two souls should cross paths in this
sprawling metropolis.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0020
rows.name:
...What am I doing here?
Hah. You need not be so guarded.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0030
rows.name:
I have just returned from a meeting with
the great generals of the Earth faction
concerning a cooperation agreement.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0040
rows.name:
But it struck me that to visit distant NLA
only to stand idly around a table would
constitute the waste of an opportunity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0050
rows.name:
And so, I have decided to take initiative,
and ask for a sparring match with NLA's
greatest warrior.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0060
rows.name:
You come at just the right time.
To you I shall pose my question.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0070
rows.name: Who is the strongest in NLA?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_JNK0080
rows.name: Say Elma

rows.label: tev900491_SEL0090
rows.name: Answer that Elma is the strongest.

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0100
rows.name:
Oho...
I did consider that may be the case.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0110
rows.name:
Even Buidhe has been strongly implying
she wished for a rematch with the warrior
named Elma...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0120
rows.name:
If she has recognized Elma as her equal,
she must be a warrior of uncommon
standing. Her acclaim stands to reason.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0130
rows.name: Say Nagi

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0140
rows.name: Answer that Nagi is the strongest.

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0150
rows.name:
Kentaro Nagi, is it? Hm. He was present
at my earlier council meeting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0160
rows.name:
Indeed, he was the only one who did
not afford a single glimpse of weakness.
Even I was overawed at his presence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0170
rows.name:
Without fail, a warrior's soul abides within
him. I am not surprised in the least to hear
that he is NLA's strongest.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_JNK0180
rows.name: Say Tatsu

rows.label: tev900491_SEL0190
rows.name: Answer that Tatsu is the strongest.

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0200
rows.name:
Tatsu...?
That is not a name I am familiar with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0210
rows.name:
...Wait. Is that not the Nopon
who always travels with you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0220
rows.name:
Hmm... Nopon are known to be feeble and
craven creatures, so one that follows you
onto the battlefield must be a rare breed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0230
rows.name:
It would require a true warrior's soul
to do so. But I never imagined he would
be NLA's strongest...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0240
rows.name:
The Nopon are quite an enigma, after all.
Judging them by their appearance is an
error I shall not make again in a hurry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0250
rows.name:
However. I am now thinking that perhaps
for you and I to cross weapons and trade
blows may be the most optimal resolution.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0260
rows.name:
It may have been a sign from the gods of
conflict that I, desirous of combat as I am,
have crossed paths with you here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_JNK0270
rows.name: Challenge

rows.label: tev900491_SEL0280
rows.name: Claim you'll take him on anytime, anywhere.

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0290
rows.name:
Hah... Spoken as a true warrior.
I knew I had the measure of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0300
rows.name:
Then I will expect great things
from our bout, friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0310
rows.name:
In the meantime, I shall look more
closely into the greatest warrior of NLA.
Await further word, and be prepared![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_JNK0310
rows.name: Stay Cool

rows.label: tev900491_SEL0320
rows.name:
Reply that you make a point of
not fighting allies.

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0330
rows.name: Hrm... There is reason in what you say.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0340
rows.name:
Now that mankind and us Wrothians are in a
binding alliance, our fighting could send a
mixed message to the general populace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0350
rows.name:
You have keen instincts, to have so
incisively seen through to the heart of the
matter. A most desirable trait in an enemy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0360
rows.name:
Hah. I jest, naturally. You humans are now
Wroth's comrades, no doubt about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0370
rows.name:
And yet, destiny weaves a fickle thread.
Perhaps it may yet ordain that we become
the deadliest of foes, once more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0380
rows.name:
I will continue to whet my fangs and
claws as I dream of that day's coming.
Ha ha ha ha...![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_JNK0390
rows.name: Flinch

rows.label: tev900491_SEL400
rows.name: Plead with him to let you keep your life.

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0410
rows.name:
My friend! Has the warrior's blood
suddenly drained from your veins?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0420
rows.name:
You should know that begging for one's
life is the quickest way to earn a noble
Wrothian's undiluted disdain![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0430
rows.name:
Were we on the battlefield, I would have
slain you where you stand. ...Lucky for
you such acts are frowned upon in cities.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0440
rows.name:
But fear not. I swear to knock your pitiable
soul back into proud shape myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900491_MSG0450
rows.name:
I shall be only too happy to give you a
taste of our training regimen, renowned
throughout the stars for its harsh rigors![ST:wait ]
